extendedInfo.description: Review, listen, and learnâ¦anytime, anywhere!Davis Mobile Pharm Phlash! Pharmacology Flash Cards features 389 of the most-prescribed generic drugs organized by body system. Just flip through the cards to select a drug name. Tap to listen to the audio pronunciation. With another tap, turn the card over to see all of the essential information you need to know to care for patients and administer the drug safely.Features:1) Multiple card sets are organized by body system for easy reference.2) Self-scoring and bookmarking allow for quick review.3) The link to the audio pronunciation of the generic drug name appears on each card.4) Card front features generic name, relevant trade name(s), phonetic spelling, and audio link.5) Card back lists therapeutic/pharmacologic class, indications, actions, adverse reactions/side effects, what to teach the patient, and âMake the Connection,â important guidelines for ensuring patient safety.6) Content downloads directly to your mobile device; no web connection is necessary after the initial download.About F.A. DavisDavis Mobile applications are produced by F.A. Davis Company. An independent and family-owned publisher, F.A. Davis has been meeting the needs of health care providers since 1879. Today, the company carries on that tradition through its catalogue of books and electronic, online, and mobile products for students, educators, and clinicians in Nursing, Medicine, and the Health Sciences. Its flagship titles, Taberâs Cyclopedic Medical Dictionary and Davisâs Drug Guide for NursesÂ®, are among the most trusted names in health care. Visit www.fadavis.com to explore our products.

reviews.title: Carl
reviews.comment: This is not a bad app, but it needs a search.  I am taking pharmacotherapeutics, and the first test is not going to cover all of the flash card. I dont want to go threw 400 cards one by one to bookmark lets say 40 cards for the first test. Update: I now give it 5 stars. I emailed the developer about the search option and in about a week an update came out with it. Great app thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Havent been able to use in weeks. Still cant use this app. I told the 40 people in my nursing school, plus faculty not to purchase
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Customer Service is excellent at F A Davis. Pharm Phlash is just what I need to get through nursing school. So happy!!
reviews.author: A Google User
